name: Let's # it out
description:
Rent is due. The landlord is angry.

Your housemates are fighting and refuse to pay the rent until their fight is resolved. It is up to you to mediate.

The walls of the share house are thin - your housemates are listening to what you say. It's not possible to make everyone happy. All endings are varying degrees of bad, and are determined by the choices that you make throughout the story.
